segments.text: The boy is reaching deep into that cookie jar, looking so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the sheer audacity of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I feel a wave of anger rising; he’s taking a risk that could easily end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could he be so reckless while the woman stands there, completely unaware?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s done this before; there’s a confidence in his movements.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire the girl for her patience, waiting so expectantly beside him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both daring and cute in a way, but it’s also quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
